extension.name: DisplayModeIcons
extension.author: Francois Guillet
extension.description: This plugin replaces the display mode dropdown list with a set of icons.

history.log: - Bug fix. Made compatible with boolean modelling window. (The 'rendered' option was not available in the menu. The attempt to remove it prevented opening the window.)

- Icon for the 'rendered'-mode added. The plugin removes 'rendered'-mode from the menu. - The menu items set the mode for all the views in a window. - Now the menu has the same behaviour in all editing windows, not just the scene window.
- Changes for compatibility with AOI 2.7 - fixed a problem that could show up if other ViewerControls had been installed (by another plugin)
